rows.label: qst103101_msg0001
rows.name:
Well well, what have we here?
A strange little band indeed.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0002
rows.name:
Different peoples coming together to
shatter the bonds of nationalism.
Perhaps you are just what I need...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, I suppose there can be
no harm in sharing my worries
with you fine people.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0004
rows.name:
My name is Hassane.
I am a scholar specializing
in ancient Nopon culture.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0005
rows.name:
There are remains of their mural work
in every corner of the world.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0006
rows.name:
I have heard that ancient Nopon murals
even exist in Invidia. I would like nothing
more than to examine them, but...

rows.label: qst103101_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, I'm sure you're aware of the
situation. Relations between Invidia
and Superbia are strained of late.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0008
rows.name:
These days, any research that we
carry out in Invidia is considered
to be "intelligence gathering".

rows.label: qst103101_msg0009
rows.name:
Personally, I've never been one
to shy away from a little danger
in the name of research.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0010
rows.name:
However, attempting to enter Invidia
through official channels would no
doubt exacerbate the political situation.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0011
rows.name:
Were I but ten years younger,
I'd stow away on a merchant ship
and enter Invidia in secret.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0012
rows.name:
Hmm...
You do realize you'd be putting
yourselves in danger too, right?

rows.label: qst103101_msg0013
rows.name:
Meeting you was a stroke of luck.
Thank you for helping out!

rows.label: qst103101_msg0014
rows.name:
So, what kind of plan are we
talking about here?

rows.label: qst103101_msg0015
rows.name:
Oho, I see, I see!
You'll enlist the help of your comrades.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0016
rows.name:
I've got it!
I'll disguise myself as your old
servant and try to blend in.

rows.label: qst103101_msg0017
rows.name:
Don't be afraid to ask anything
of me! It'll make my disguise
all the more believable.
